Climb Evolution: 30' Climb
Companion Darkvision: 60' b/w vision in darkness
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed Reflex save yields half damage
Constrict Evolution: Successful grapple gives dbl grab damage
Damage Reduction Evolution: DR 5/opposite alignment
Devotion: +4 Will vs. enchantment
Energy Attacks Evolution: Natural attack inflicts +1d6 HP of chosen energy type
Fast Healing Evolution: Heals 1 HP/rd
Flight Evolution: 30' Fly
Frightful Presence Evolution: R30' Foes suffer frightened (up to 11 HD) or shaken (up to 15 HD) (DC 17 Will neg) for 3d6 rd
Gills Evolution: May breathe underwater
Gore Evolution: Horn attack inflicts 1d8+11 HP
Grab Evolution: Successful chosen natural attack allows free combat maneuver to grapple/+4 grapple CMB
Immunity Evolution: Immune to 1 chosen energy type(s)
Improved Damage Evolution: Choice of 1 natural attacks each inflict damage 1 die type higher
Limbs (Arms) Evolution: Has 1 pairs of arms
Link (Summoner): May communicate on same plane w/eidolon over any distance/Shares magic item slots w/eidolon
Magic Attacks Evolution: Natural attacks count as magic and aligned
Mount Evolution: Self may ride eidolon
Multiattack: Reduces additional attack penalty to -2 or gives second attack at -5
Pincers Evolution: Pincer attacks inflict 1d8+5 HP each
Poison Evolution: Chosen natural attack inflicts +1d4 Str damage each rd for 4 rd (DC 21 Fort neg) 1/rd
Pounce Evolution: May take full-attack action after a charge
Pull Evolution: Successful attack w/choice of 1 natural attacks each allow free combat maneuver for 5' pull
Push Evolution: Successful attack w/choice of 1 natural attacks each allow free combat maneuver for 5' push
Rake Evolution: Claw rake on grappled foe inflicts 2 x 1d6+11 HP
Reach Evolution: Chosen natural attack gains +5' reach
Rend Evolution: 2 successful claw attacks inflict +1d6+16 HP
Resistance Evolution: Resistance 15 to 1 chosen energy type(s)
Scent Evolution: R30' May detect foes by smell
Share Spells (Summoner): May cast spells that affect self on eidolon as touch spells
Skilled Evolution: +8 on each of 1 chosen skill(s)
Slam Evolution: Slam attacks inflict 2d6+11 HP each
Spell Resistance Evolution: Has Spell Resistance 31
Sting Evolution: Sting attacks inflict 1d6+11 HP each
Swallow Whole Evolution: May make combat maneuver to swallow creature grappled by bite, inflicting 1d8+11+1d6 HP/rd
Swim Evolution: 30' Swim
Tail Evolution: +2 Acrobatics (balance)
Tail Slap Evolution: Slap attacks inflict 1d8+5 HP each
Tentacle Evolution: Tentacle attacks inflict 1d6+5 HP each
Trample Evolution: Full-round automatic overrun inflicts 1d8+16 HP (DC 28 Ref half)
Tremorsense Evolution: R30' Senses creatures via ground vibrations
Trip Evolution: Successful bite allows free combat maneuver to trip
Weapon Training Evolution: Proficient with simple weapons
Web Evolution: R50' May entangle target (DC 21 Escape Artist or -4 Str neg) 8/dy
Wing Buffet Evolution: 2 wing attacks inflict 1d6+5 HP each
